Bukan Tutup, PO Bus ke Kertajati Rugi Saingan sama Damri Gratis
04 Nov 2019, 06:33 by He


Foto: Yudha Maulana

Jakarta - Bandara Internasional Jawa Barat (BIJB) Kertajati kembali menjadi sorotan. Kini sorotan muncul dari keluhan para pengusaha transportasi umum yang mengaku menutup trayek karena sepi penumpang ke Kertajati.Manajemen BIJB pun buka suara, menurut Corporate Secretary BIJB Arief Budiman tidak ada perusahaan yang menutup trayek. Menurutnya, yang terjadi sekarang adalah para perusahaan transportasi ini merugi karena bersaing dengan bus Damri yang digratiskan pemerintah. Masyarakat lebih memilih naik Damri dibanding bus lain yang berbayar."Tidak ada perusahaan antarmoda di Kertajati yang gulung tikar. Kebenaranya bahwa moda di sini memang belum menguntungkan, karena layanan Damri gratis masih menjadi pilihan masyarakat," ucap Arief saat dihubungi detikcom, Senin (4/11/2019).Meski begitu, Arief membantah ada perusahaan yang menutup trayeknya. "Moda yang beroperasi di sini masih melakukan layanan," lanjutnya.Sebelumnya, Kementerian Perhubungan menyatakan bahwa tidak ada perusahaan yang menutup trayek. Pasalnya cuma ada Damri dan Blue Bird yang mengoperasikan trayek Kertajati.Namun, menurut data yang disampaikan Arief, selain Blue Bird dan Damri masih banyak operator lain yang membuka trayek ke Kertajati. Setidaknya masih ada 12 operator lainnya yang membuka rute ke Kertajati.Mulai dari CTU Shuttle, MyTrans, ECA Shuttle, P. Trans, Baraya, Mekarsari, Arnes, Budiman, Bhineka Shuttle, Sobat Trans, Urban Travel, bahkan hingga aplikasi transportasi online Grab.Operator tersebut membuka rute yang menghubungkan BIJB dengan berbagai daerah di Jawa Barat, mulai dari Cirebon, Bandung, Tasikmalaya, Indramayu, Kuningan, Jatinangor, Sumedang, Majalengka, Maja, Kadipaten, Tonjong, Cikijing, Purwakarta, dan Rajagaluh. Sebelumnya, pengusaha angkutan umum di Cirebon terpaksa menutup trayek tujuan Bandara Kertajati di Kabupaten Majalengka, Jawa Barat. Penutupan trayek tujuan BIJB itu menurut Sekretaris DPC Organda Kota Cirebon Karsono disebabkan karena sepinya penumpang."Sekarang BIJB kan sepi, senyap kembali. Sekarang memang sudah pada tutup. Ya rata-rata lah, di Cirebon itu ada sekitar 15 pengusaha angkutan yang sempat membuka shuttle arah BIJB," kata Karsono kepada detikcom, Jumat (1/1/2019).Simak Video "Lahan di Area Bandara Kertajati Terbakar"[Gambas:Video 20detik](zlf/zlf)

Not Closed, PO Bus to Kertajati Rugi Rival with Damri Free
Nov. 04, 2019, 06:33 by He


Photo: Yudha Maulana

Jakarta - Kertajati West Java International Airport (BIJB) is back in the spotlight. Now the spotlight arises from complaints from public transportation entrepreneurs who claim to close the route because there are empty passengers to Kertajati. BIJB management also opened its voice, according to BIJB Corporate Secretary Arief Budiman there were no companies that closed the route. According to him, what is happening now is that these transportation companies are losing money because they are competing with Damri buses that are free of charge by the government. The public prefers to take Damri over other paid buses. "There are no intermodal companies in Kertajati that have gone out of business. The truth is that the mode here is not yet profitable, because free Damri services are still the people's choice," Arief said when contacted by AFP on Monday (4) / 11/2019).If so, Arief denied there were companies that closed the route. "Modes operating here still provide services," he continued. Previously, the Ministry of Transportation stated that there were no companies that closed the route. The reason is that only Damri and Blue Bird operate the Kertajati route. However, according to data presented by Arief, in addition to Blue Bird and Damri there are still many other operators who open the route to Kertajati. There are at least 12 other operators that open routes to Kertajati. Starting from CTU Shuttle, MyTrans, ECA Shuttle, P. Trans, Baraya, Mekarsari, Arnes, Budiman, Bhineka Shuttle, Trans Friends, Urban Travel, and even online Grab transportation applications. The operator opened a route connecting BIJB with various regions in West Java, starting from Cirebon, Bandung, Tasikmalaya, Indramayu, Kuningan, Jatinangor, Sumedang, Majalengka, Maja, Duchy, Tonjong, Cikijing, Purwakarta, and Rajagaluh. Previously, public transport entrepreneurs in Cirebon were forced to close routes to Kertajati Airport in Majalengka Regency, West Java. The closure of the BIJB destination route, according to DPC Secretary Organda of Cirebon, Karsono, was caused by the lack of passengers. "Now BIJB is quiet, quiet again. Now it is already closed. Yes, on average, there are around 15 transportation entrepreneurs in Cirebon who had opened the shuttle. the direction of BIJB, "Karsono told AFP on Friday (1/1/2019).
